title.text: A Tool fora High-Carat Gold-Standard Word Alignment

abstractContent.text: In this paper, we describe a tool designed to produce a gold-standard word alignment between a text and its translation with a novel visualization.

entities.text: word alignment between a text and its translation

abstractContent.text: In addition, the tool is designed to aid the aligners in producing an alignment at a high level of quality and consistency.
This tool is presently being used to align the Hebrew Bible with an English translation of it.
